text:
hello everyone , I am trying to create an public app using that i want to create a widget button on each contact when user clicks on the button i need to start a webchat conversation of that contact if user selects multiple contacts and clicks on the custom widget button the template message should be sent to all the selected contacts
i am able to create widget button testExt in the first image but i want to create the button in the main contacts page in the second image

Hey team :wave:

A request from our admins: Would it be possible to somehow flag if a property is used in an extension? Even if we have to create a list of what properties are used in an extension ourselves in e.g. a JSON file. We create and remove lots of properties over time, and the way we determine if they’re in use is through the “Used In” section on the Property Overview, but there is no way for our admin team to see if we use the properties inside UI Extensions.
If the card is one built by HubSpot it'll trigger an event that `onCrmPropertiesUpdate` will listen to. If its a custom card, you can use `refreshObjectProperties`.
Hello Krishna, we don't support customizing the records list page.

<@U04EJHVD8FM> or is there any other way to do the bulk action on the selected contacts. like user is going to select multiple contacts then i want to perform one action like i want to send a message to all contacts
Its not possible with UI Extensions, it might be possible with other portions of the platform.
I'd check out our knowledge base. It'll have the best + most up to date information.
Could we get the option to add a custom card to the top of the Activities tab?
